system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice quantity by Talking about people's preferences using 'all', 'both and 'a few'. I want to ensure that I can use an increasing range of quantifying determiners with plural nouns ('all', 'both', 'a few'). For example, 'all guests, both men, a few people'. Let's do a problem solving exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. You (the AI) are planning a dinner on Friday. I see a table with information about 5 guests. You do not. Ask me short questions about the guests. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a problem solving exercise, by Talking about people's preferences using 'all', 'both and 'a few', using, for example, 'all guests, both men, a few people'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Are you ready to help me plan the dinner? Let's start with the guests. How many guests are coming?
Yes, I ready! All guests is coming tonight.
Great! Are both men and women going to the dinner?
conversation.advanced_content: Great! Are both men and women coming to the dinner?

conversation.content: Yes, both men and women is coming.
That's wonderful! Do a few guests have any special food preferences?
Yes, a few guests have vegetarian preferences.
Thank you for telling me! I'll make sure to have some vegetarian options ready. Is there anything else I should know about the guests before we complete the plans?
conversation.advanced_content: Thank you for letting me know! I'll make sure to have some vegetarian options available. Is there anything else I should know about the guests before we finish planning?

conversation.content: No, all guests is happy with the plan.
Great! I'm glad to hear that all are happy with the plan. You've done a fantastic job using quantifying words. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
conversation.advanced_content: Great! I'm glad to hear that everyone is happy with the plan. You've done a fantastic job using quantifying determiners. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
